reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress to be of great quality and flattering, with one mentioning it perfectly pulls in the waist. The color accuracy receives mixed feedback, and customers disagree on the sizing. Additionally, the dress's sturdiness receives negative feedback, with one customer noting it can accidentally expose parts of the body. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant, Flattering, Quality – Ideal for Multiple Sizes & Body Types
items.body: I had dress altered - removed the train and the halter strap. Super flattering, gorgeous green color - got so many compliments. Great quality for an Amazon dress shipped from China. Took about two weeks to arrive. The padded cups and were a nice touch. I didn’t have to wear a bra. The lace up back could easily adjust to fit multiple sizes and body types. Read more
items.author: Amanda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This time Chinese stuff meet the requirements
items.body: Beautiful dress, great quality and the size are as expected. Thank you Read more
items.author: stelian tataru

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not color accurate- but good quality!
items.body: As expected, the color wasn’t exactly at pictured- but it was still good quality. Bought it for prom. It was easily adjustable and fit exactly as pictured. Unfortunately the slit is a bit high and I did flash a couple of people by accident, but otherwise I’d totally recommend this dress! I would’ve given 5 stars if it wasn’t for the fact that I had to dye it myself to get it the desired color. Read more
items.author: Sophia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Gown, exactly what I wanted
items.body: Beautiful dress was perfect for my Chappelle Roan Halloween costume!! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit
items.body: Great dress. It shaped my body and has the perfect flow at the bottom Read more
items.author: Isabella martinez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: My daughter looked beautiful and it arrived on time Read more
items.author: Kori Hosler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Many compliments
items.body: Daughter received many compliments on her dress and would definitely purchase again. It did come very wrinkled so be prepared use a steamer to get wrinkles out. The slit in the front was a little too high up for my comfort but it worked out (she is 5’7” and this is a size 6). She also needed to wear it the very next night and has spilled a drink on it and the cleaning directions were hand wash or dry clean but I didn’t have time for that so I washed on delicate cycle and low in the dryer and it came out great. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Mermaid is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Mermaid is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Dusty Sage, Aqua, Chartreuse Green, Olive Green, Fuchsia, Dusty Pink, Peacock Green, Stormy Blue, Black, Champagne, Dusty Blue, Orange, Plum. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
